ai-patthana22.24:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.24:0.3_0: In the past, future, and present,
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_0: Not for the sake of the path, or for the sake of all things,
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_1: not for the sake of the path, not for the sake of teaching, or for the sake of all condition.
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_2: Neither in the past, nor in the future, nor in the present for the sake of the present.
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.24:2.1_0: There are three drops of the objects that haven’t been reborn in the next life. ...
ai-patthana22.24:3.1_0: Experiencing the teaching, Etc. In the past, future consciousness arises conditioned by cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.24:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
